title: Parasite
description: The flock had run wild for over a thousand years, their numbers increasing with each generation. Racial memory only seeped out through the dreams of the disturbed, their true purpose forgotten.His stirring body craved sustenance, his thoughts focussed on, once again, to quench his yearning for the sweet taste of hot human blood. The time of the cull had arrived.
author: Ian Woodhead
